nodes.text: The V-171 was a type of atmospheric vehicle used on Jelucan during the Age of the Empire. One such ship belonged to Dalven Kyrell. V-171s were manned by two people, a pilot and a co-pilot who faced backwards in the cockpit. The vehicle had an engine on either side, which created a blue glow when activated.
V-171s first appeared in the canon novel Lost Stars, which was written by Claudia Gray and published in 2015.
